text:
Message 1455 of 4024
You and I are both next week, correct?
Sent:02/16/2024 at 12:47 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 12:56 PM)
Subject:Re: Hoops
Message 1456 of 4024
She can’t see me till Friday
I think it goes:
- You- Monday
- Me- Friday
- Us- not scheduled
And I realized I can’t reply (like with SAAS). So I’m completely at your mercy. With nothing planned at this point and we had hoped to wrap last
week, would you consider just asking what conditions would be appropriate for just some simple face time?
I hope I add some value to his life.
Sent:02/16/2024 at 01:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 01:00 PM)
Subject:Re: Hoops
Message 1457 of 4024
Hey!
Given Basketball was canceled, can we touch base real quick at 6:00? No, it is not an emergency. But we have a huge list of things that only got more
important as we ignored them for two weeks. I assure you I will be very civil. We always were for “running list” meetings. We can even do it that way
if you like.
I am not going to make this an anxious engagement. I want to reverse course, and know we both want peace and what’s best for the kids. Let’s modify
Dr Brown rules to ask ourselves “is this peaceful and constructive? Is this in the best interest of our children” I believe you can do it, and I know I can
too!
“A journey of a thousand miles, starts with a single step” let’s please take the solitary step to build on.
Thank You!
-robert
Sent:02/16/2024 at 02:08 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/16/2024 at 02:12 PM)
Subject:Touch Base
